name: Cucumber Goat Cheese Spread

ingredients.name: seedless cucumber
ingredients.original_string: 1 seedless cucumber, peeled, seeded, and chopped fine (about 1 1/2 cups)

ingredients.name: soft mild goat cheese
ingredients.original_string: 8 ounces soft mild goat cheese (about 1 cup), at room temperature

ingredients.name: finely chopped fresh tarragon leaves
ingredients.original_string: 2 teaspoons finely chopped fresh tarragon leaves

ingredients.name: accompaniment: toasted french bread slices
ingredients.original_string: Accompaniment: toasted French bread slices or crackers

instructions: In a food processor pur√©e 1/2 cup cucumber with goat cheese, zest, and lemon juice until almost smooth. In a bowl stir together cucumber mixture, remaining cucumber, tarragon, 1 tablespoon onion, and pepper. Spread may be made 2 days ahead and chilled, covered. Let spread soften and stir it before serving. Sprinkle spread with remaining tablespoon onion.
Serve spread with toasts or crackers.
